name: Protection from Chaos
text: This spell functions like protection from evil, except that the deflection and resistance bonuses apply to attacks made by chaotic creatures. The target receives a new saving throw against control by chaotic creatures and chaotic summoned creatures cannot touch the target.
mythicText: As mythic protection from evil, except against chaotic creatures.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘防护邪恶 (protection from evil)’一般，不过偏斜与抗力加值只应用至混乱生物做出的攻击。目标在对抗混乱生物进行的控制时会获得新的豁免机会，并且混乱召唤生物无法接触目标。
mythicText_zh: 除了对抗混乱生物之外，皆与神话防护邪恶（Protection from Evil）相同。
